config.title: AdGuard Home Settings
config.description: Point MMM at your self-hosted AdGuard Home instance. Provide the base URL and credentials encoded for HTTP Basic auth (Base64 of username:password, as required by the AdGuard Home dashboard).

fields.label: AdGuard Home URL
fields.description: Base URL to the AdGuard Home dashboard accessible from MMM (e.g., http://192.168.1.100:3000). Include protocol and port.

fields.label: API Token
fields.description: Base64-encoded string of `USERNAME:PASSWORD` used for AdGuard dashboard login. For example, echo -n 'admin:secret' | base64.
